messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/31/2008 3:01:55 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
robin.bentley@... writes:

Here's a great page from Sandra Dodd's site, which clarifies "learning
vs. teaching" from an unschooling point of view.

_http://sandradodd.com/teaching/_ (http://sandradodd.com/teaching/)


Thank you! That's just what I needed to read. We have just started our
unschooling journey and although we are loving and embracing it completely, I
(just me) have so many doubts. Every day does seem to get better so hopefully I
will overcome it.
